awd_abstract_narration: The purpose of this project is to evaluate the utility of                  the Bureau of Labor Statistics' universe file as a sampling frame               for National Science Foundation's surveys concerned with R&D                    expenditures, primarily in the industrial sector.                                    The Bureau of Labor Statistics will develop several reports                that analyze R&d information in the universe file and the                       Occupational Employment Statistics master file. Information will                be provided at both the two and four digit Standard Industrial                  Classification levels, with stratification by size of firm and                  other variables.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics.

inst.inst_name: Department of Labor Bureau of Labor Statistics
